item.title: About
item.description: Hello! I am xenocidewiki, a mathematics student at the University of Edinburgh. This is my blog where I will post random reverse engineering and programming content, as well as my writeups for various CTF challenges that I solve. I am currently playing for the cr0wn and focus on RE tasks. I have rather broad interests, RE is naturally one of them, however I also thoroughly enjoy looking at things within cryptography, pwning or any type of exploitation really, the windows kernel, and game hacks.
